Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark from Minnesota
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  I coach golf and can take pictures of swings and get 15 pictures from start to finish.  The Macro pictures look amazing.  very easy to use the instructions are good enough to be using a certain type of picture in minutes.  I would, and have, reccommend this to friends!
